SA11n1128:3: uktaṃ hi bhagavatyām- sa teṣāmeva sattvānāmarthāya dhyānapāramitāyāṃ carannavikṣiptacitto bhavati |
SA11n1128:5: tathā hyasyaivaṃ - bhavati laukikī dhyānopapattirapi tāvadvikṣiptacittasya durlabhā,
SA11n1128:9: punarasyāmuktam- punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādamupādāya dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caran sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktairmanasikārairdhyānaṃ samāpadyate |
SA11n1128:10: sa cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā na nimittagrāhī bhavati nānuvyañjanagrāhī |
SA11n1128:11: yatodhikaraṇamasya cakṣurindriyeṇāsaṃvarasaṃvṛtasya viharato'bhidhyādaurmanasye anye vā pāpakā akuśalā dharmāścittamanuprāpnuyuḥ,
SA11n1128:18: manasā dharmān vijñāya na nimittagrāhī bhavati,
SA11n1128:23: sa gacchannapi tiṣṭhannapi niṣaṇṇo'pi śayāno'pi bhāṣamāṇo'pi samāhitāvasthāṃ [na] vijahāti |
SA11n1128:43: tathā hi sa svalakṣaṇaśūnyānasaṃbhūtānaniṣpannānanabhinirvṛttān sarvadharmān paśyatīti vistaraḥ ||
SA11n1128:51: tathā- māyopamaṃ vitathametatsvapnopamaṃ ca saṃskṛtamavekṣya na cirādbhaviṣyati viyogaḥ sarvapriyaiḥ,
SA11n1128:53: udyujya yathā ghaṭata nityaṃ pāramitāsu bhūmiṣu baleṣu |
SA11n1128:54: mā jātu sraṃsaya vīryaṃ yāvanna budhyathā pravarabodhim | iti ||
SA11n1128:57: bhavaniḥ saraṇe sada mūḍha jagadbhramati bhramaro yatha kumbhagataḥ ||
SA11n1128:58: adhruvaṃ tribhavaṃ śaradabhranibhaṃ naṭaraṅgasamā jagi janmacyutiḥ |
SA11n1128:59: girinadyasamaṃ laghuśīghrajavaṃ vrajatāyu jage yatha vidyu nabhe ||
SA11n1128:61: parivartiṣu pañcagatiṣvabudhā yatha kumbhakarasya hi cakrabhramī ||
SA11n1128:64: sabhayāḥ saraṇāḥ sada vairakarāḥ bahuśokaupadrava kāmaguṇāḥ |
SA11n1128:68: yatha agnikhadā jvalitāḥ sabhayāḥ tatha kāma ime viditāryajanaiḥ |
SA11n1128:70: yatha sarpaśiro yatha mīḍhaghaṭaḥ tatha kāma ime viditā viduṣām |
SA11n1128:71: tatha śūlasamā dvijapeśisamā yatha śvānakaraṃka savairamukhā ||
SA11n1128:72: dakacandranibhā iti kāmaguṇāḥ pratibimba ivā girighoṣa yathā |
SA11n1128:74: kṣaṇikā vasikā iti kāmaguṇāḥ tatha māyamarīcisamā alikā |
SA11n1128:76: prathame vayase vararūpadharaḥ priya iṣṭa mato iya bālacarī |
SA11n1128:78: dhanadhānyavaro bahudravyabalī priya iṣṭa mato iya bālacarī |
SA11n1128:79: parihīṇadhanaṃ puna kṛcchragataṃ vijahanti narā iva śūnyaṭavīm ||
SA11n1128:80: yatha puṣpadrumo saphalo va drumo naru dānaratastatha prītikaraḥ |
SA11n1128:81: dhanahīnu jarārditu yācanako bhavate tada apriya gṛdhrasamaḥ ||
SA11n1128:83: jaravyādhidukhārditu kṣīṇadhano bhavate tada apriya mṛtyusamaḥ ||
SA11n1128:84: jarayā jaritaḥ samatītavayo drama vidyuhato va yathā bhavati |
SA11n1128:85: jarajīrṇa agāra yathā sabhayo jaraniḥ saraṇaṃ laghu brūhi mune ||
SA11n1128:86: jara śoṣayate naranārigaṇaṃ yatha mālulatā ghanaśālavanam |
SA11n1128:87: jara vīryaparākramavegaharī jara paṅkanimagna yathā puruṣo ||
SA11n1128:89: sada saukhyaharī paribhāvakarī jara mṛtyukarī jara ojaharī ||
SA11n1128:91: jaravyādhigataṃ prasamīkṣya jagat dukhaniḥsaraṇaṃ laghu deśayahī ||
SA11n1128:93: tatha ojaharo ayu vyādhi jage parihīyati indriyarūpabalam ||
SA11n1128:95: pratighātakaraḥ priyadveṣakaraḥ paridāhakaro yatha sūryu nabhe ||
SA11n1128:96: maraṇaṃ cyavanaṃ cyuti kālakriyā priyadravyajanena viyogu sadā |
SA11n1128:97: apunāgamanaṃ ca asaṃgamanaṃ drumapatraphalā nadistrotu yathā ||
SA11n1128:98: maraṇaṃ vaśitāna vaśīkurute maraṇaṃ harate nadidāru yathā |
SA11n1128:100: maraṇaṃ grasate bahu prāṇiśatān makaro va jalākari bhūtagaṇān |
SA11n1128:101: garuḍo uragaṃ mṛgarāja gajaṃ jvalano va tṛṇauṣadhibhūtagaṇam ||iti ||
SA11n1128:102: rājāvavādakasūtre'pyāha- tadyathā mahārāja catasṛbhyo digbhyaścatvāraḥ parvatā āgaccheyurdṛḍhāḥ sāravanto'khaṇḍā acchidrā asuṣirāḥ susaṃvṛtā ekaghanā nabha[ḥ] spṛśantaḥ pṛthivīṃ collikhantaḥ sarvatṛṇakāṣṭhaśākhāparṇapalāśādisarvasattvaprāṇibhūtāni nirmathnantaḥ |
SA11n1128:103: tebhyo na sukaraṃ javena vā palāyituṃ balena vā dravyamantrauṣadhibhirvā nivartayitum,
SA11n1128:104: evameva mahārāja catvārīmāni mahābhayānyāgacchanti yeṣāṃ na sukaraṃ javena vā palāyituṃ balena dravyamantrauṣaghairvā nivartanaṃ kartum |
SA11n1128:112: tadyathā mahārāja siṃho mṛgarājo rūpasaṃpanno javasaṃpannaḥ sujātanakhadaṃṣṭrākarālo mṛgagaṇamanupraviśya mṛgaṃ gṛhītvā yathākāmakaraṇīyaṃ karoti |
SA11n1128:113: sa ca mṛgo'tibalaṃ vyālamukhamāsādya vivaśo bhavati |
SA11n1128:114: evameva mahārāja viddhasya mṛtyuśalyenāpagatamadasyāparāyaṇasya marmasu chidyamāneṣu mucyamāneṣu saṃghiṣu māṃsaśoṇite pariśuṣyamāṇe paritaptatṛṣitavihvalavadanasya karacaraṇavikṣepābhiyuktasya akarmaṇyasyāsamarthasya lālāsiṅghāṇakapūyamūtrapurīṣopaliptasya īṣajjīvitāvaśeṣasya karmabhavātpunarbhavamālambamānasya yamapuruṣabhayabhītasya kālarātrivaśagatasya caramāśvāsapraśvāseṣu prarudhyamāneṣu ekākino'dvitīyasyāsahāyasyemaṃ lokaṃ jahataḥ paralokamākrāmato mahāpathaṃ vrajato mahākāntāraṃ praviśato mahāgahanaṃ samavagāhamānasya mahāndhakāraṃ pratipadyamānasya mahārṇavenohyamānasya karmavāyunā hriyamāṇasya animittīkṛtāṃ diśaṃ gacchato nānyattrāṇaṃ nānyaccharaṇaṃ nānyatparāyaṇamṛte dharmāt |
SA11n1128:115: dharmo hi mahārāja tasmin samaye trāṇaṃ layanaṃ śaraṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ bhavati |
SA11n1128:123: bhayabhītasya balavantaḥ sahāyāḥ sādhavaḥ pratiśaraṇā bhavanti,
SA11n1128:124: evameva mahārāja viddhasya mṛtyuśalyena apagatamadasyātrāṇasyāparāyaṇasya nānyattrāṇaṃ nānyatparāyaṇamanyatra dharmāt |
SA11n1128:127: dharmeṇaiva te mahārāja rājyaṃ kārayitavyaṃ nādharmeṇa |
SA11n1128:130: ātmabhāvasyaivaṃ suciramapi parirakṣitasya suciramapi śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyāsvādanīyena saṃtarpitasya saṃpravāritasya kṣutpipāsāparigatasya kālakriyā bhaviṣyati |
SA11n1128:132: evamapi te mahārāja snānānulepanavāsadhūpapuṣpasurabhigandhasyātmabhāvasya nacireṇa durgandhatā bhaviṣyati |
SA11n1128:133: evaṃ stryagāramadhyagatasyāpi te strīgaṇaparivṛtasya nānāvādyagītatūryanāṭayairupagīyamānasya sumanasaḥ krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayato maraṇabhayabhītasya atīva duḥkhadaurmanasyābhyāṃ kālakriyā bhaviṣyati |
SA11n1128:134: evamapi te mahārāja gṛheṣūpalepanopalipteṣu susthāpitārgaleṣu supihitavātāyaneṣu bahugandhadhūpapuṣpatailavartiprajvāliteṣvāsaktapaṭṭadāmakalāpeṣu muktakusumāvakīrṇeṣu gandhaghaṭikānirdhūpiteṣu vinyastapādapīṭhapaṭikāstaraṇagoṇikastaraṇakācalindikaprāvaraṇasāntaropacchadapaṭikobhayakṛtopadhāneṣu paryaṅkeṣu śayitvā |
SA11n1128:135: punaśca śṛgālakākagṛghramṛtakalevaramāṃsāsthikeśarudhiravasākule paramabībhatse śmaśāne gataceṣṭasyātmabhāvaḥ pṛthivyāmavaśaḥ śeṣyate |
SA11n1128:136: evamapi te mahārāja gajaskandhāśvapṛṣṭharathābhirūḍhasya śaṅkhapaṭaheṣvāhanyamāneṣu chatreṇa dhāryamāṇena vālavyajanena vīja[ya]mānasyānekahastyaśvarathapadātibhiranuyātasyāñjaliśatasahastrairnamaskriyamāṇasya nirgamanamanubhūya nacirānniśceṣṭasya mṛtaśayanābhirūḍhasya caturbhiḥ puruṣairutkṣiptasya dakṣiṇena nagaradvāreṇa nirṇītasya mātāpitṛbhrātṛbhaginībhāryāputraduhitṛvayasyadāsīdāsakarmakarapauruṣeyaiḥ śokagatahṛdayairvikṣiptabhujaiḥ sorastāḍaṃ paramakaruṇaṃ- hā putra hā nātha hā tāta hā svāmin ityākrandamānaiḥ paurajānapadaiḥ saparibhavadṛśyamānasya śmaśānaṃ nītasya punaḥ kākagṛghraśvaśṛgālādibhirbhakṣitasya tānyasthīnyagninā vā dagdhāni pṛthivyāṃ vā nikhānitāni adbhirvāklinnāni vātātapavarṣairvā cūrṇīkṛtāni digvidikṣu prakṣiptāni tatraiva pūtabhāvamāyāsyanti |
SA11n1128:143: tatra āryaratnameghe tāvadāha- sa rāgasya pratipakṣaṃ bhajate,
SA11n1128:150: yaduta santyasmin kāye keśā romāṇi nakhā dantā rajomalaṃ tvak māṃsāsthi snāyuḥ śirā vṛkkā hṛdayaṃ plīhakaḥ klomakaḥ antrāṇi antraguṇaḥ,
SA11n1128:152: audaryakaṃ yakṛtpurīṣamaśru svedaḥ kheṭaḥ siṅghāṇakaḥ vasā lasīkā majjā medaḥ pittaṃ śleṣmā pūyaṃ śoṇitaṃ mastakaṃ mastakaluṅgaṃ prastrāvaḥ |
SA11n1128:153: eṣu ca vastuṣu bodhisattva upaparīkṣaṇajātīyo bhavati |
SA11n1128:154: tasyaivamupaparīkṣamāṇasyaivaṃ bhavati- yo'pi tāvatsyādbālo mūḍhaḥ abhavyo'kuśalaḥ,
SA11n1128:155: so'pi tāvadetāni bastūni jñātvā rāgacittaṃ notpādayet,
SA11n1128:158: bhagavatyāmapyuktam- punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carannimamevaṃ kāyaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
SA11n1128:159: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte goghātako vā goghātakāntevāsī vā gāṃ hatvā tīkṣṇena śastreṇa catvāri phalakāni kṛtvā pratyavekṣate sthito'thavā niṣaṇṇaḥ |
SA11n1128:160: evameva subhūte bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carannimameva kāyaṃ dhātuśo yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
SA11n1128:161: astyasmin kāye pṛthivīdhāturabdhāturapi tejodhāturapi vāyudhāturapīti || peyālaṃ ||
SA11n1128:162: punarapyāha- tadyathāpi nāma subhūte karṣakasya mūtoḍī pūrṇā nānādhānyānāṃ śālīnāṃ vrīhīṇāṃ tilānāṃ taṇḍulānāṃ mudgānāṃ bhāṣāṇāṃ yavānāṃ godhūmānāṃ masūrāṇāṃ sarṣapāṇām ,
SA11n1128:163: tānetān cakṣuṣmān puruṣaḥ pratyavekṣamāṇaḥ evaṃ jātīyādayaṃ śālirayaṃ vrīhiramī tilā amī taṇḍulā amī mudrā amī māṣā amī yavā amī godhūmā amī masūrā amī sarṣapā iti ||
SA11n1128:164: evameva bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carannimameva kāyamūrddhaṃ pādatalādadhaḥ keśamastakanakharomatvakromaparyantaṃ pūrṇaṃ nānāprakārasyāśuceryathābhūtaṃ pratyavekṣate- santyasmin kāye keśā romāṇi nakhā yāvanmastakaṃ mastakaluṅgamakṣigūthaṃ karṇagūthamiti ||
SA11n1128:166: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvaḥ śmaśānagataḥ paśyati nānārūpāṇi mṛtaśarīrāṇi śmaśāne'paviddhāni śavaśayane ujjhitāni ekāhamṛtāni vā dvayahamṛtāni vā tryahamṛtāni vā caturahamṛtāni vā pañcāhamṛtāni vā vyādhmātakāni vinīlakāni vipūyakāni vipaṭhayakāni,
SA11n1128:167: sa imameva kāyaṃ tatropasaṃharati- ayamapi kāya evaṃdharmā evaṃsvabhāvaḥ etāṃ dharmatāmavyativṛtta iti ||
SA11n1128:168: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bahirdhā kāye kāyānudarśī viharati ||
SA11n1128:170: punaraparaṃ yadā mṛtaśarīrāṇi śmaśāne utsṛṣṭāni paśyati,
SA11n1128:174: sa imameva kāyaṃ tatropasaṃharatiayamapi kāya evaṃdharmā evaṃsvabhāvaḥ,
SA11n1128:176: punaraparaṃ yadā mṛtaśarīrāṇi paśyati śmaśāne utsṛṣṭāni vikhāditānyaśucīni durgandhāni,
SA11n1128:179: punaraparaṃ yadā paśyati mṛtaśarīrāṇi śivapathikāyāmasthisaṃkalikāṃ māṃsaśoṇitabhrakṣitāṃ snāyuvinibaddhām |
SA11n1128:181: punaraparaṃ yadā mṛtaśarīrāṇi paśyati śivapathikāyāmasthisaṃkalībhūtāni apagatamāṃsaśoṇitasnāyubandhanāni,
SA11n1128:183: punaraparaṃ yadā paśyati śivapathikāyāmasthīni digvidikṣu kṣiptāni,
SA11n1128:194: punaraparaṃ yadā paśyati śivapathikāyāmasthīnyanekavārṣikāṇi vātānupariśoṣitāni śaṅkhasaṃnibhāni,
SA11n1128:196: ayamapi kāya evaṃdharmā evaṃsvabhāva etāṃ dharmatāṃ na vyativṛtta iti ||
SA11n1128:197: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran yadā paśyati śivapathikāyāmasthīnyanekavārṣikāṇi tirobhūtāni nīlāni kapotavarṇāni pūtīni cūrṇakajātāni pṛthivyāṃ pāṃśunāśamasabhībhūtāni,
SA11n1128:198: sa imameva kāyaṃ tatropasaṃharati- ayamapi kāya evaṃdharmāḥ evaṃsvabhāvaḥ,
SA11n1128:203: tena vā saha bhojanādyekārthatayā prītyutpādanaṃ tatra parasukhasyāśaṃsā prārthanā tṛṣṇābhinandanaṃ maitrī |
SA11n1128:205: sā trividhā āryākṣayamatisūtre'vihitā- satvārambaṇā maitrī prathamacittotpādikānāṃ bodhisattvānām,
SA11n1128:209: tatra sattvārambaṇāyāḥ pūrvaṃ priye sattve hitasukhopasaṃhārānna dhyānamabhyasya |
SA11n1128:220: sa bodhisattvacaryāṇāṃ caran yāvanti kānicid dṛśyante rūpāṇi manojñāni vā pratikūlāni vā,
SA11n1128:221: evaṃ śabdā gandhā rasā spraṣṭavyā dharmā manojñā vā pratikūlā vā,
SA11n1128:234: satatasukhaṃ saṃvedayamāna evaṃ pariṇāmayati sarvabuddhānāmetayā pariṇāmanayā bhūyasyā mātrayāte buddhā bhagavanto'cintyena buddhavihārasukhena samanvāgatā bhavantu,
SA11n1128:244: evaṃ bodhisattvastatkuśalamūlaṃ tathāgateṣu pariṇamayya bodhisattveṣu pariṇāmayati |
SA11n1128:245: yadidamaparipūrṇānāmabhiprāyāṇāṃ paripūraṇāya pariṇāmayati apariśuddhānāṃ sarvajñatādhyāśayānāṃ pariśuddhayai |
SA11n1128:254: sa evaṃ tatkuśalamūlaṃ bodhisattvānāmarthāya pariṇamayya buddhaśāsanāvacareṣu sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddheṣu tatkuśalamūlameva pariṇāmayati |
SA11n1128:269: tathā sa bodhisattvaḥ sarvasattveṣu tatkuśalamūlaṃ pariṇāmayati ||
SA11n1128:281: tasya yatkiṃciccīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyagamanāgamanaśarīropasthānaniṣadyādiniṣevaṇāyatanānāṃ pravartanakarma īryāpathādhiṣṭhānamīryāpathasyāvikopanaṃ kāyakarma vākkarma manaskarma sucaritaṃ ṣaṇṇāmindriyāṇāṃ saṃvaraḥ svaśarīrācchādanamardanasnānakarma,
SA11n1128:291: antaśaḥ śvasvapi tadanyeṣvapiṃ tiryagyonigateṣvekaudanonmiñjitamekālopaṃ vā parityajati |
SA11n1128:292: sugatāvupapattiṣu tatsarvaṃ teṣāmeva hitāya teṣāmeva parimocanāya pariṇāmayati |
SA11n1128:303: imāśca suvarṇaprabhāsoktā maitrīkaruṇāgarbhā gāthāḥ sarvā ādarataḥ samanvāhṛtya bhāvayitavyā antaśo vacasāpi-
SA11n1128:306: anena co dundubhighoṣanādinā śāmyantu sarvavyasanāni loke |
SA11n1128:307: bhavantu sattvā hyabhayāhatā tathā yathābhayāḥ śāntabhayā munīndrāḥ ||
SA11n1128:310: anena co dundubhighoṣanādinā bhavantu brahmasvara sarvasattvāḥ |
SA11n1128:312: tiṣṭhantu kalpāni acintiyāni deśantu dharmaṃ jagato hitāya |
SA11n1128:313: hanantu kleśān bidhamantu duḥkhān samentu rāgaṃ tatha doṣa moham |
SA11n1128:314: ye sattva tiṣṭhanti apāyabhūmau ādīpta saṃprajvalitāsthigātrāḥ |
SA11n1128:315: śṛṇvantu te dundubhi saṃpravāditaṃ namo'stu buddhāya bhaṇantu vācam ||
SA11n1128:316: jātismarāḥ sattvā bhavantu sarve jātīśataṃ jātisahastrakoṭayaḥ |
SA11n1128:317: anusmarantū satataṃ munīndrān śṛṇvantu teṣāṃ vacanaṃ hyudāram ||
SA11n1128:318: anena co dundubhighoṣanādinā labhantu buddhehi samāgamaṃ sadā |
SA11n1128:319: vivarjayantū khalu pāpakarma carantu kuśalāni śubhakriyāṇi ||
SA11n1128:320: sarvatra kṣetreṣu ca sarvaprāṇināṃ sarve ca duḥkhāḥ praśamantu loke |
SA11n1128:321: ye sattva vikalendriya aṅgahīnāḥ te sarvi sakalendriya bhontu sāṃpratam ||
SA11n1128:322: ye vyādhitā durbalakṣīṇagātrā nistrāṇabhūtāḥ śayitā diśāsu |
SA11n1128:323: te sarvi mucyantu ca vyādhito laghu labhantu cārogyabalendriyāṇi ||
SA11n1128:325: te sarvi sattva vyasanāgataduḥkhitā hi mucyantu tairbhayaśataiḥ paramaiḥ sughoraiḥ ||
SA11n1128:326: ye tāḍitā bandhanabaddhapīḍitā vividheṣu vyasaneṣu ca saṃsthitā hi |
SA11n1128:328: te sarvi mucyantviha bandhanebhyaḥ saṃtāḍitā mucyiṣu tāḍanebhyaḥ |
SA11n1128:329: badhyāśca saṃyujyiṣu jīvitena vyasanāgatā nirbhaya bhontu sarve ||
SA11n1128:330: ye sattva kṣuttarṣapipāsapīḍitā labhantu te bhojanapāna citram |
SA11n1128:331: andhāśca paśyantu vicitrarūpāṃ badhirāśca śṛṇvantu manojñaghoṣān ||
SA11n1128:332: nagrāśca vastrāṇi labhantu citrāṃ daridrasattvāśca nidhiṃ labhantu |
SA11n1128:333: prabhūtadhanadhānyavicitraratnaiḥ sarve ca sattvāḥ sukhino bhavantu ||
SA11n1128:334: mā kasyacidbhavatu duḥkhavedanā saukhyānvitāḥ sattva bhavantu sarve |
SA11n1128:336: manasānnapānāḥ susamṛddhapuṇyāḥ saha cittamātreṇa bhavantu teṣām |
SA11n1128:337: vīṇāmṛdaṅgāḥ paṇavāḥ sughoṣakāḥ utsā sarāḥ puṣkariṇī taḍāgāḥ ||
SA11n1128:339: gandhaṃ ca mālyaṃ ca vilepanaṃ ca vāsaśca cūrṇaṃ kusumaṃ vicitram ||
SA11n1128:340: triṣkālavṛkṣemi pravarṣayantu gṛhṇantu te sattva bhavantu hṛṣṭāḥ |
SA11n1128:341: kurvantu pūjāṃ daśasū diśāsu acintiyāṃ sarvatathāgatānām ||
SA11n1128:343: nīcāṃ gatiṃ sattva vivarjayantu bhavantu aṣṭākṣaṇavītivṛttāḥ ||
SA11n1128:344: āsādayantū jinarājamuttamaṃ labhantu buddhehi samāgamaṃ sadā |
SA11n1128:345: sarvāḥ striyo nitya narā bhavantu śūrāśca vīrā vidupaṇḍitāśca ||
SA11n1128:346: te sarvi bodhāya carantu nityaṃ carantu te pārimitāsu ṣaṭsu |
SA11n1128:347: paśyantu buddhān daśasū diśāsu ratnadrumendreṣu sukhopaviṣṭān |
SA11n1128:351: tatra pratītyasamutpādaḥ śālistambasūtre'bhihitaḥ- tatrādhyātmikasya pratītyasamutpādasya hetūpanibandhaḥ katamaḥ?
SA11n1128:359: tatra avidyāyā naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ saṃskārānabhinirvartayāmīti |
SA11n1128:361: evaṃ yāvajjātyā naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ jarāmaraṇamabhinirrvartayāmīti |
SA11n1128:362: jarāmaraṇasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ jātyā nirvṛtta iti |
SA11n1128:369: yadidaṃ pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśavijñānadhātūnāṃ samavāyādādhyātmikasya pratītyasamutpādasya pratyayopanibandho draṣṭavyaḥ ||
SA11n1128:381: yo nāmarūpamabhinirvartayati naḍakalāpayogena pañcavijñānakāyasaṃprayuktaṃ sāstravaṃ ca manovijñānam,
SA11n1128:387: tatra pṛthivīdhātornaivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ kāyasya kaṭhinabhāvabhinirvartayāmīti |
SA11n1128:394: tatra pṛthivīdhāturnātmā na sattvo na jīvo na janturna manujo na mānavo na strī na pumānna napuṃsakam,
SA11n1128:398: evamabdhātustejodhāturvāyudhāturākāśadhāturvijñānadhāturna sattvo na jīvo na janturna manujo na mānavo na strī na pumānna napuṃsakaṃ na cāhaṃ na mama na cāpyanyasya kasyacit ||
SA11n1128:400: yā eṣveva ṣaṭsu dhātuṣvekasaṃjñā piṇḍasaṃjñā nityasaṃjñā dhruvasaṃjñā śāśvatasaṃjñā sukhasaṃjñā ātmasaṃjñā satvajīvamanujamānavasaṃjñā,
SA11n1128:410: catvāri ca mahābhūtāni copādāya upādāya rūpamaikadhyamabhisaṃkṣipya tannāmarūpam |
SA11n1128:424: ye vānye evamādaya upakleśāsta upāyāsāḥ || peyālaṃ ||
SA11n1128:426: evamavidyāyāṃ satyāṃ trividhāḥ saṃskārāḥ abhinirvartante puṇyopagā apuṇyopagā āniñjyopagāśca |
SA11n1128:443: āsvādanābhinandanādhyavasānam- mā me priyarūpasātarūpairviyogo bhavatviti aparityāgo bhūyo bhūyaśca prārthanā,
SA11n1128:445: evaṃ prārthayamānaḥ punarbhavajanakaṃ karma samutthāpayati kāyena vācā manasā |
SA11n1128:452: evamayaṃ dvādaśāṅgaḥ pratītyasamutpādo'nyonyahetuko'nyonyapratyayato naivānityo na nityo na saṃskṛto nāsaṃskṛto na vedayitā na kṣayadharmo na nirodhadharmo na virāgadharmaḥ anādikālapravṛtto'nudbhinno'nupravartate nadīstrotavat |
SA11n1128:454: imānyasya dvādaśāṅgasya pratītyasamutpādasya catvāri aṅgāni saṃghātakriyāyai hetutvena pravartante |
SA11n1128:456: yaduta avidyā tṛṣṇā karma vijñānaṃ ca |
SA11n1128:465: tatra karmaṇo naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ vijñānabījaṃ snehayāmīti |
SA11n1128:466: abidyāyā api naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ vijñānabījamavakirāmīti |
SA11n1128:467: vijñānabījasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati- ahamebhiḥ pratyayairjanita iti |
SA11n1128:468: api tu vijñānabīje karmakṣetrapratiṣṭhite tṛṣṇāsnehābhiṣyandite'vidyāvakīrṇe tatratatropapattyāyatanasaṃghau mātuḥ kukṣau virohati,
SA11n1128:470: sa ca nāmarūpāṅkuro na svayaṃkṛto na parakṛto nobhayakṛto niśvarādinirmito na kālapariṇāmito na caikakāraṇādhīno nāpyahetusamutpannaḥ |
SA11n1128:471: atha ca mātāpitṛsaṃyogādṛtusamavāyādanyeṣāṃ ca pratyayānāṃ samavāyādāsvādānupraviddhaṃ vijñānabījaṃ mātuḥ kukṣau nāmarūpāṅkurabījamabhinirvartati |
SA11n1128:472: asvāmikeṣu dharmeṣu amameṣu aparigraheṣu apratyarthikeṣu ākāśasameṣu māyālakṣaṇasvabhāveṣu hetupratyayānāmavaikalyāt |
SA11n1128:475: cakṣuśca pratītya rūpaṃ ca ālokaṃ ca ākāśaṃ tajjaṃ ca manasikāraṃ pratītyotpadyate cakṣurvijñānam |
SA11n1128:485: tatra cakṣuṣo naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasyāśrayakṛtyaṃ karomīti |
SA11n1128:486: rūpasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati- aha cakṣurvijñānasyārambaṇakṛtyaṃ karomīti |
SA11n1128:488: ākāśasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasyānāvaraṇakṛtyaṃ karomīti |
SA11n1128:489: tajjamanasikārasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasya samanvāhārakṛtyaṃ karomīti |
SA11n1128:490: cakṣurvijñānasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati- ahamebhiḥ pratyayairjanita iti |
SA11n1128:491: atha ca punaḥ satsveṣu pratyayeṣu cakṣurvijñānasyotpattirbhavati prādurbhāvaḥ |
SA11n1128:497: evameva karmakleśajanitaṃ vijñānabījaṃ tatratatro papattyāyatanapratisaṃdhau mātuḥ kukṣau nāmarūpāṅkuramabhinirvartayati,
SA11n1128:498: asvāmikeṣu dharmeṣu amameṣu aparigraheṣu apratyarthikeṣu ākāśasameṣu māyālakṣaṇasvabhāveṣu,
SA11n1128:502: na śāśvatato nocchedato na saṃkrāntitaḥ parīttahetuto vipulaphalābhinirvṛttitaḥ tatsadṛśānuprabandhataśceti |
SA11n1128:505: na tu ya eva māraṇāntikāḥ skandhāsta evaupapatyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ |
SA11n1128:506: api tu māraṇāntikāśca skandhā nirudhyamānā aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāśca prādurbhavanti |
SA11n1128:509: na ca niruddheṣu skandheṣu aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti,
SA11n1128:526: yaḥ kaścidbhadanta śāriputra imaṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ bhagavatā samyakpraṇītamevaṃ yathābhūtaṃ samyakprajñayā satatasamitamajīvaṃ nirjīvaṃ yathāvadaviparītamajātamabhūtamakṛtamasaṃskṛtamapratighamanāvaraṇaṃ śivamabhayaṃ mahārthamavyayamavyupaśamamasvabhāvaṃ paśyati,
SA11n1128:531: aparāntaṃ vā punarna pratisarati- kiṃ nu bhaviṣyāmyanāgate'dhvani,
SA11n1128:534: pratyutpannaṃ vā punarna pratisarati- kiṃsvididaṃ kathaṃ svididam,
SA11n1128:536: āryadaśabhūmake'pyuktam- tatra avidyā tṛṣṇopādānaṃ ca kleśavartmano'vyavacchedaḥ |
SA11n1128:539: api tu khalu punaryaducyate-avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā iti,
SA11n1128:551: hanta vayamevaṃ bahudoṣaduṣṭaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ viditvā asya saṃyogasya asyāśca sāmagryā vyavacchedaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ |
